letters.description: Acknowledge the client's feelings and experiences using art, helping them articulate unspoken emotions.
Explore the symbolism and metaphors within the artwork to uncover deeper meanings and insights.
Facilitate the surfacing of subconscious thoughts and feelings through the creative process, promoting self-awareness.
Identify recurring themes and patterns in the client's artwork to gain a comprehensive understanding of their challenges.
Collaboratively develop actionable strategies based on the insights gained from the art therapy session.
Empower the client to liberate themselves from limiting beliefs and integrate new learning through continued art practice and reflection.
